articles.title: Biden Backs Extending Gaza Ceasefire After Hamas Frees More Hostages - NDTV
articles.description: Hamas released a third group of hostages including a four-year-old American girl Sunday, in exchange for Palestinian prisoners on day three of a truce which a source close to the Hamas said they were willing to prolong.
articles.content:
A source close to Hamas said the group was willing to prolong the pause.
